item.description:
ğŸš€ v2.7.3â€” Flying Rabbit ğŸ‡ğŸª½

Fixes:

  • Fixed regression in album artwork view
  • Fixed HUD for older versions of macOS
  • Added volume feedback for HUD when enabled in macOS settings
  • Added option to display percentages for HUDs
  • Created a new custom HUD for when the notch is open
  • Fixed NowPlaying controller launching Apple Music by itself
  • Improved responsiveness of volume slider
  • Improved onboarding experience

ğŸš€ v2.7 â€” Flying Rabbit ğŸ‡ğŸª½

Shelf 2.0

Major update with improved stability, enhanced functionality, and a refreshed UI.

  • New Context Menu â€“ Right-click in the notch to access various file actions
  • Multi-Item Selection â€“ Hold â‡§ for consecutive or âŒ˜ for non-consecutive selections
  • Double-Click to Open â€“ Double-click on selected files to open them
  • Move by Default â€“ Dragging files now moves them; hold âŒ¥ to copy
  • Simplified Removal â€“ Files can be removed after dragging (configurable in Settings)
  • Expanded Drag Detection â€“ The shelf opens when files are dragged into the notch area
  • Expanded Sharing â€“ More sharing services available in Settings

Complete HUD Replacement

Full support for macOS system controls:

  • Screen Brightness, Keyboard Brightness, and System Volume
  • Keyboard Brightness Controls: âŒ˜ + Brightness Down/Up
  • Option (âŒ¥) â€“ Triggers alternate action configured in Settings
  • Option + Shift (âŒ¥ â‡§) â€“ Adjustments in smaller increments

Music Enhancements

  • YouTube Music Support Rewritten â€“ Now powered by WebSocket for better accuracy and performance

Note: Requires version 3.11+ of YouTube Music/Pear Desktop. Updating is strongly recommended.

  • Redesigned Music Controls â€“ Fully customizable:
    • Skip backward/forward by 15 seconds
    • Adjust music app volume
    • Mark favorite songs (Apple Music & YouTube MusiZ
    • Rearrange or remove existing controls
  • Optimized Spotify Artwork Cache â€“ Significantly reduced storage usage with automatic cleanup
  • Lyrics (Beta) â€“ View synchronized lyrics for currently playing songs

Calendar Improvements

  • New setting to hide all-day events
  • New setting to auto-scroll to next current or upcoming event
  • New setting to prevent truncation of long event names

Improved Window Behavior

  • Enhanced Fullscreen Detection â€“ Significantly more reliable
  • Better Edge Handling â€“ Fixed top edge cursor issues
  • Reduced Title Bar Interference â€“ Less intrusive during fullscreen
  • Lock Screen Support â€“ Notch now appears on lock screen
  • Screenshot Privacy â€“ Hide notch from screenshots and recordings

Advanced Settings

  • Cleaner interface with lesser-used settings moved to Advanced
  • Accent color override reintroduced

General Enhancements

  • Numerous UI fixes and polish
  • Localization updates across all supported languages

ğŸ‘‹ New Contributors

@azhao4227 Â· @bueckerlars Â· @TheMalenia Â· @Corentin132 Â· @SupKittyMeow Â· @M7T5M3P Â· @charshith Â· @Decryptu Â· @EnesCinr Â· @lambegraham

item.title: 2.7-rc.1 Flying Rabbit ğŸ‡ğŸª½
item.description:
ğŸ‡ boring.notch v2.7 â€“ Flying Rabbit RC 1

Release Candidate - July 27, 2025

âœ¨ What's New & Improved

  • ğŸ› ï¸ Fixed hanging issues: Resolved stability concerns by addressing test instability. (by @Alexander5015)
  • ğŸ“… Calendar Settings Resolved: Calendar settings now update correctly with authorization; proper show/hide.
  • ğŸµ YouTube Music Controller:
    • Improved shuffle and repeat UX, beta features for shuffle/repeat now available.
    • Fixed seek control bugs and added forced polling.
    (by @pranav1st & @Alexander5015)
  • ğŸ”² MediaRemoteAdapter.Framework updated
  • ğŸ”ƒ Button order and repeat toggle improved: Better player button logic and new repeat toggle.
  • ğŸ Now Playing Controller Beta: Beta enhancements and settings (known bugs remain for testing).
  • â™»ï¸ Shuffle is now always enabled.
  • ğŸ’¡ Refactored Shuffle & Repeat: toggleShuffle/toggleRepeat refactored for improved experience.

â€” The Boring Team

item.title: 2.7-rc.0 Flying Rabbit ğŸ‡ğŸª½
item.description:
ğŸ‰ Release v2.7 Flying Rabbit RC 0 â€” Boring Notch

We're thrilled to announce Boring Notch v2.7: Flying Rabbit RC 0, packed with powerful new features, polish, and community contributions!

ğŸš€ Highlights

  • ğŸ”‹ Enhanced Battery Status \& Charging Experience Thanks to @AlexLemus-Dev
    • More informative battery menu: percentage, max capacity, charging, low power, and status icons
    • Configurable battery indicators, notifications, and display options
    • Interactive battery icon with detailed info and instant System Preferences access
    • Visual alignment and consistent styling (macOS-like bolt/plug icons, dark mode, etc.)
    • Optimized and documented code, robust error handling, and improved performance
    • Details \& Demo
  • ğŸ–¥ï¸ Fullscreen Detection \& Playback Management Fixes @Alexander5015 improved reliability of media controls during fullscreen transitions
    • PR #449
  • ğŸ¦· Allow 0 Height Notch Now supports notches with zero height for enhanced layout flexibility
    • Thanks, @yaxarat! PR #397
  • ğŸ›ï¸ Multiple Media Controllers Control and display several media controllers at once
    • PR #460
  • ğŸ‘€ Sneak Peek \& Jiggle Fixes Re-added sneak peek and improved animation stability
    • PR #409
  • ğŸ—“ï¸ New Calendar Service Seamlessly integrates your calendar into Boring Notch
    • PR #589
  • ğŸ“„ Updated LICENSE Keeping compliance and clarity up to date
    • PR #590
  • ğŸ†• Onboarding \& Better Settings Window Streamlined onboarding and redesigned settings for easy configuration
    • PR #600
  • ğŸ“¸ Camera Toggle Feature New camera quick toggle, privacy-first!
    • Added by @Steve-sy PR #598
  • ğŸµ MediaRemote Adapter Support Improved compatibility with MediaRemote devices
    • PR #631

ğŸ†• Welcoming First-Time Contributors!

Contributor PR Link
@sancho1952007 (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/431)
@Ein-Tim (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/405)

@oorischubert (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/409)
@Al3Gr (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/493)
@ChemicalChaos-Fabian42 (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/509)
@Davetheword (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/501)
@Steve-sy (https://github.com/TheBoredTeam/boring.notch/pull/598)

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements

  • Visual and animation refinements for battery/media indicators
  • Enhanced error handling, code reorganization, and extensive documentation
  • Optimizations for consistent performance across all system conditions

Thank you ğŸŒŸ to everyoneâ€”new and returningâ€”for their effort in making this release feature-rich, steady, and super fun!

Try Boring Notch v2.7 â€” Flying Rabbit RC 0 and let us know what you think!

â€” The Boring Notch Team

item.description:
ğŸ‰ v2.6 ğŸš€ Wolf Painting ğŸº

We're thrilled to announce the release of Wolf Painting version 2.6! ğŸŠ This major update brings numerous improvements and new features that will make your experience even more enjoyable.


Download from here

ğŸ¤” What's Changed? ğŸ¤“

  • ğŸ§  Improved memory management and thread safety across the app
  • ğŸ¥ Enhanced webcam handling with better session lifecycle management
  • ğŸ¨ Added option to choose between classic and modern notch animations
  • âš¡ï¸ Improved fullscreen detection with Finder exclusion
  • ğŸ”„ Better hover state handling and reduced animation flicker
  • ğŸ”‹ Enhanced power status notifications and battery indicators
  • âš™ï¸ Improved screen lock and display change handling
  • ğŸµ Better music playback state tracking and elapsed time accuracy
  • âœ¨ Added "Buy us a coffee" option in Welcome screen
  • âš ï¸ Added warning badges for unsupported extensions
  • ğŸ› Various bug fixes and stability improvements
  • For more details, check out our website
